title: A Sign of not Times, Dutch Treat for Si :-)
content:
Si should be able to figure this one. He is such a Hawk when it comes to type :-)

ChrisL

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/steeler_holland_fan.jpg)
author: dezcom

comments.content: Are you asking about the placename sign or the terrible towel?

Chester,  
It is the juxtaposition of the two (seahawk blue sign and black and gold towel)—shall we say mixed metaphor :-)  
Si will immediately know the bird.

ChrisL

The blue isn’t quite right - see the chap in the right on this pic.

[http://flickr.com/photos/jlt/28615752/in/pool-typecon/](http://web.archive.org/web/20060210094539/http:/flickr.com/photos/jlt/28615752/in/pool-typecon/)

LOL!!! Wonder who “the chap on the right” is:-)

ChrisL
